form.PN:
pridevnik ali samostalnik izgovarjamo
/m*Qd@r@1t/
, glagol pa
/m*Qd@reIt/
.

sense.def:
Politična mnenja ali ukrepi, ki so
moderate
, niso skrajni in zastopajo postopne ali majhne spremembe.

seg.quote: The movement drew its support from moderate conservatives.

sense.def:
A moderate
je človek, čigar politična mnenja in delovanje niso skrajni.

seg.quote: The moderates have plenty to be anxious about.

sense.def:
Količina je
moderate
, kadar ni ne velika ne majhna.

seg.quote: The sun's rays, in moderate quantities, are important for health.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
moderates something
, poskrbi, da nekaj postane manj skrajno ali nasilno in bolj sprejemljivo.

seg.quote: She had been given instructions to moderate her tone.
